projects.name: weddzilla.com
projects.description: Managed a team of 3 developers, the interactive design process, and the deployment of a social platform for connecting wedding vendors with wedding planners (http://weddzilla.com). Converted business requirements into user stories, collaborated with the business owner on their prioritization, and conducted daily scrum meetings to gauge developer progress and identify blockers. Contributed to Rails development and architected application from front-end to its stack, including domain modeling, background jobs, and third-party API integration (PayPal merchant account, Facebook, Google Maps), et cetera.
